ygData.subject: Re: New to tinkering...best way to raise skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Making flameless lanterns is the way to go to gain skill, a warning though one of the patches sort of messed with tinkering where you will rarely gain
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:45 PM 7/22/99 CDT, you wrote:
>From: "Kendera the Enchantress" <kendera_@...>
>
>Hi all, my character is rapidly approaching 16th level and I want to tinker
>(imagine that!).
>
>What is the best way to increase skill?
>Also, are the components only found in Steamfont? I haven't been there
>since I started.
>
>Thanks for putting up with my newbie questions,
>

Making flameless lanterns is the way to go to gain skill, a warning though
one of the patches sort of messed with tinkering where you will rarely gain
skill points now. I don't know if this has been changed.

The only place to buy tinkering components is in Steamfont.

-Luke

Tinkering guide website
http://www.eqportal.com/Tinkering
Last updated: 6-22-99
